title: The gallant rights, Christian priviledges, solemn institutions of the sea-green order or The martial colours of the three grand Machabean nobles, viz. 1. Captain-Honesty, of the linage of David. II. Captain Justice, of the linage of Solomon. III. Captain Freedom, of the linage of Nehemiah. Being all up now in arms contra gentes, for a good people and a good Parliament, according to this their present declaration.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
